name: Spiky Adventures
description:
Spiky Adventures is a platformer-like game where you must control your flower character and glide through the map with the wind plants, your goal is to collect the 9 red petals that got robbed from your village, to collect them, you must solve puzzles and glide carefully.

Controls : A D or Arrow keys to move, use the wind plants to glide through the map.

My first game jam game and completed game I've made.

This game made for the Weekly Game Jam 167.
